original_text: Also provide mounts for Paul to ride and bring him safely to Felix the governor.”
korean_text: 또 바울을 태워 총독 벨릭스에게로 무사히 보내기 위하여 짐승을 준비하라 명하며

sentences.original_text: Also provide mounts for Paul to ride
sentences.korean_translation: 또 바울이 탈 탈 것을 준비하고

sentences.original_text: and bring him safely to Felix the governor.
